aboutMe: My name is Ntando Mabuto from Cape Town. I am a well motivated person and I push myself to get everything done. I garduated from high school in 2022. Knowledge is power and everytime I learn new things I get excited I was introduced to the tech industry at grade ten, since then I set a new goal of being the best and a professional IT specialist. Although I am still new in the industry but everyday is a new lesson so I am getting better with time. On my free time I do self studying to improve my skills, things I enjoy doing are listening to music. Working individually is efficient but group work is done quickly, I work well within groups because different minds bring up bright ideas. I also do self motivate

projects.name: Calculator
projects.description: I only used css and html for this project and it was my first project, but I updated it using javascript

projects.description: The keyboard was my first favourite project, designed using HTML and CSS

projects.description: I used html and css for the add up, the user puts in an array in the input tag and the numbers add up

projects.name: Minutes to Seconds Converter
projects.description: The minutes to seconds converter, I also used html and css and javascript. It converts any minutes into seconds

projects.name: Interest Amount
projects.description: I also used used the three languages I learnt for this, it calculates the interest of the amount of your choice

education.description: Currently at the Life Choices Academy, graduated from high school in 2022 with a Bachelor pass

testimonials.name: Yonela Mangele
testimonials.message: Ntando's consistent creative approach to solving problems is what makes him a reliable individual.

testimonials.name: Tyra Parring
testimonials.message: His creativity and work ethic makes him an excellent individual to work with.

testimonials.name: Sihlandlo Makhumsha
testimonials.message: Ntando is a very committed hard worker and an inspiring person. When given a task, he makes sure it's completed on the given time period. He would definitely be of great value in any team.

testimonials.name: Yolanda
testimonials.message: Ntando is a joy to be around, he has a relaxed and easy-going nature. His energy is contagious and he always gets people around him to smile and laugh. His positive attitude and willingness to learn is admirable, which makes his a valued team member.
